meanings.definition: A story or movie containing events that precede those of an existing work.
meanings.sent1: I enjoy watching prequels to learn about the events that happened before.
meanings.sent2: The prequels of the series explained the backstory of the main character.
meanings.sent3: The prequels revealed the secrets of the past in a fascinating way.
meanings.sent4: Watching the prequels was like uncovering hidden treasures of the storyline.
meanings.sent5: The prequels painted a vivid picture of the characters' origins.

meanings.definition: The events or stories that come before those of an existing work.
meanings.sent1: Before reading the book, I wanted to know more about the prequels.
meanings.sent2: The prequels provided context for the main plot of the story.
meanings.sent3: The prequels added depth to the narrative with their intriguing twists.
meanings.sent4: Exploring the prequels felt like stepping into a time machine of storytelling.
meanings.sent5: The prequels set the stage for the epic tale that followed.
